name: tm41
effect: Teaches Torment to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Torment to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: ThunderPunch Gen I: Softboiled)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user torments and enrages the foe, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.
flavor_text.platinum: The user torments and enrages the foe, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user torments and enrages the foe, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.
